original_text: Now there was in Joppa a disciple named Tabitha, which, translated, means Dorcas. She was full of good works and acts of charity.
korean_text: 욥바에 다비다라 하는 여제자가 있으니 그 이름을 번역하면 도르가라 선행과 구제하는 일이 심히 많더니

sentences.original_text: Now there was in Joppa a disciple named Tabitha
She was full of good works and acts of charity
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 선행과 자선 행위로 가득 찼습니다
